title: Garlic French Vinaigrette
instructions: In a small saucepan boil the garlic in 2 inches of water for 15 minutes, or until it is tender, then drain it.  In a bowl mash the garlic to a paste and whisk in the cream, the mustard, the lemon juice, adding salt and pepper to you taste, and whisk until the mixture is slightly thickened.  At this point add the oil, drip by drip, while you continue to whisk until the vinaigrette is emulsified.
Source:  The Last Touch:  Vinaigrettes, Gourmet Magazine, May 1991.
